WRITING.TITLE: Bernie Sanders' national field director is running Tom Perriello's campaign for governor in Virginia. This is the biggest race of 2017 and this sub has ignored it completely.
WRITING.TEXT:
There are only two statewide races this year. In Virginia and in New Jersey. This is the first chance we will get to reject Trumpism in support of Progressivism.
[So far this](https://www.reddit.com/r/SandersForPresident/comments/5tnt4b/there_are_two_gubernatorial_races_this_year_in/) sub does [not care](https://www.reddit.com/r/SandersForPresident/comments/5monp9/tom_perriello_candidate_for_governor_of_virginia/). If we truly want to make a difference we need to act now. We can not wait for 2018, the people of Virginia and New Jersey need /r/SandersForPresident's support right now!
I don't know much about New Jersey but I do know that former congressman Tom Perriello is challenging Virginia's democratic establishment to win the Governor's race. He is not a fringe candidate, in fact his statewide appeal may be greater than his party opponent. So far he has filled his campaign with Sanders campaign alums and Clinton advisors. [He wants to bring this party together while pushing it in a new direction. ](https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/virginia-politics/sanders-alum-to-lead-tom-perriellos-campaign-for-virginia-governor/2017/02/07/d3892150-ed4c-11e6-9973-c5efb7ccfb0d_story.html) The combination of Sanders activists and some Clinton hands is a pretty fascinating group, said Bob Holsworth, a longtime Virginia political analyst. Hes been able to do that in part because theres not a lot of governors races going on. There was some talent out there, and hes identified it and clearly raised enough money to hire it.
Perriello's victory is key for this movement. Do not ignore 2017.

Buzzfeed and CNN did not report that the information in the dossier is correct, they reported that it exists and is being passed around within high levels of government.
The dossier was written by an influential British spy, given to Sen. John McCain who then gave it to the FBI. The intelligence community then mentioned it in a briefing with the president and president-elect.
For a news agency to receive the dossier, learn about the briefing and then choose not to report on it would be an abdication of their journalistic responsibility.
